subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 21 points while playing only 20 minutes, and the host Dallas Mavericks had their largest victory ever, 123-70, over the Philadelphia 76ers.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 21 points while playing only 20 minutes, and the host Dallas Mavericks had their largest victory ever, 123-70, over the Philadelphia 76ers.
